Title: Relates to exempting the costs of BOCES services and programs from the real property tax levy limit
Summary: Exempts the costs associated with expenditures resulting from the purchase of BOCES services and programs from the real property tax levy limit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to exempting the costs associated with expenditures resulting from the purchase of BOCES services and programs from the real property tax levy limit
